_sText:
**Map Made By ProfessorOak**
**Map Made For Interactive 3D*
__________________________________
Special Thanks To Westsider! ( Advice + Help! )

Hosties_Fort_V2. 
__________________________________
Map includes: 
1*   Shot 4 Shot ( Located @ the bridge )
2*   Gun Toss ( Located @ the fort )
3*   Race isn't available ( Because of the rarely use. )
4*   Knife Fight, possible everywhere!
5*   Chicken Fight, possible everywhere!
6*   A fort
7*   A 'Forest'
8*   Bridge between Fort & Forest
9*   Breakable pieces in the bridge ( 5 )
10* A bunker ( Located at the forest )
11* Fire spots
12* Simon says :cage
13* Simon says :wall
14* Simon says :Laser-Wall ( Instead of Simon kill the 'losers', he must execute them )
15* Design colors, Green, Red, Blue
16* 4 jails, 4 buttons. 
17* Kill-All-Jails button. ( Located next to the 4 jails. )
18* Secret button to open the room, where the Kill-All-Jail button is located. 
19* Main gate to open the fort. 
20* Button located at the first controle room to open the main gate. 
21* Second controle room ( The 'Simon-Room'. This room faces to the first & Laser wall )
22* 1 secret way. 
23* 2 vents which can be broken. ( First 150 damage, Second one: just 10 damage )
24* And many other things!
25* Enjoy!

X ProfessorOak
